```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

```{r}
bird_data <- read_csv(here("clean_data/bird_data_clean"))
```

Which bird had the most individual sightings?
```{r}
bird_data %>% 
  group_by(species_abbreviation) %>%
  summarise(total = sum(count)) %>% 
  arrange(desc(total))
```

Which bird had the highest total count?
```{r}
bird_data %>% 
  top_n(1, count)
```
